name: Animal Kingdom 2 Quiz | Mixed Animal Trivia | 10 Questions

questions.text: One way to avoid snakes is to what?
According to dog care experts, what is the best thing you can put next to a puppy to comfort him?
questions.explanation:
Clock.

	The ticking noise comforts them.

questions.text: Cats were once sacred animals in what ancient culture?
